description: The future release of 18 Sicilian fishermen from a Libyan jail could depend on demands for a prisoner swap.
title: Fisherman in Sicily marooned in jail in 'red prawn war'
title_page: Fisherman in Sicily marooned in jail in 'red prawn war' - BBC News
maintext: "The interviews we did were very detailed. They all had the same things in common about the way the crossing was organised and how violence unfolded during the trip," says Alessandro Drago, one of the police officers who interviewed the surviving migrants after they were rescued at sea.
